data.question: What is the empirical formula of the crystal studied?
What technique was used to measure nitrogen adsorption isotherms?
data.answer: Micromeritics ASAP 2020 Surface Area and Porosity Analyzer

data.question: At what temperature and under what atmosphere was the TGA of as-synthesized 1 performed?
data.answer: At a heating rate of 2 °C/min under a constant stream of N2

data.question: What was the BET surface area of activated 1?
What change in the IR spectra indicates the disappearance of DMF and methanol after activation?
data.answer: The disappearance of the strong DMF C=O stretch at 1647 cm-1 and the appearance of a methanol C-O stretch at 1005 cm-1

data.question: Is the crystal structure of 1 trigonal?
Does the synthesis of 2,5-disulfhydrylbenzene-1,4-dicarboxylic acid (H4DSBDC) involve potassium formate?
Was the FP-TRMC technique used to evaluate the charge mobilities of Mn2(DSBDC) materials?
Did the TOF measurements reveal that the photocurrent transients for methanol-exchanged 1 and activated 1 are identical?
Is the Mn–S chain considered the primary charge transport pathway in Mn2(DSBDC) materials?
Was the crystal growth of Mn2(DSBDC) achieved by heating a solution of MnCl2·4H2O and H4DSBDC at 120 °C for 48 hours?
Is the BET surface area of activated 1 less than 500 m2/g?
What was the method used to replace DMF molecules in the synthesis of Mn2(DSBDC)?
data.answer: Soxhlet extraction with freshly dried and deaerated methanol for 2 days

data.question: What is the role of the Soxhlet extraction in the synthesis process of Mn2(DSBDC)?
data.answer: To clean the crude product and exchange the bound DMF molecules with methanol

data.question: What does the presence of a green hue in methanol-exchanged 1 indicate?
data.answer: The replacement of DMF by methanol

data.question: What was the purpose of heating methanol-exchanged 1 under high vacuum?
data.answer: To achieve activation of Mn2(DSBDC) by removing guest and bound methanol

data.question: What does the term 'activated 1' refer to in the context of Mn2(DSBDC) synthesis?
data.answer: The state of Mn2(DSBDC) after heating methanol-exchanged 1 under high vacuum to remove methanol

data.question: What was the crystal system identified for the structure of 1?
What was the space group determined for the crystal structure of 1?
What was the final R indices for the crystal structure of 1 when I>2sigma(I)?
